reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 572/98: DEEMING ORDER - GERALDTON AND SUBURBAN PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.reg_name_text: DEEMING ORDER — GERALDTON AND SUBURBAN PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 572/98: DEEMING ORDER - GERALDTON AND SUBURBAN PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. (1) Ontario Regulation 364/81, as it read immediately before its revocation under section 2, shall be deemed to be and to always have been a by-law of the Geraldton and Suburban Planning Board in respect of the land described in the Schedule. O. Reg. 572/98, s. 1 (1). (2) The deemed by-law shall be referred to as by-law number 98-2040 of the Geraldton and Suburban Planning Board. O. Reg. 572/98, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Ontario Regulation 364/81, as it read immediately before its revocation under section 2, shall be deemed to be and to always have been a by-law of the Geraldton and Suburban Planning Board in respect of the land described in the Schedule. O. Reg. 572/98, s. 1 (1).

(2) The deemed by-law shall be referred to as by-law number 98-2040 of the Geraldton and Suburban Planning Board. O. Reg. 572/98, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 572/98, s. 2. Schedule The geographic townships of Ashmore, Errington, Fulford and McQuesten in the District of Thunder Bay. O. Reg. 572/98, Sched.
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 572/98, s. 2.

Schedule

The geographic townships of Ashmore, Errington, Fulford and McQuesten in the District of Thunder Bay.

O. Reg. 572/98, Sched.
